weapon.name: Striking Martial Arts
weapon.description: You use Karate, Boxing, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, Capoeira or some other striking martial art to attack.

weapon.name: Grappling Martial Arts
weapon.description: You use Jujutsu, Aikido, Judo, or some other grappling/joint locking martial art to attack.

weapon.name: Security
weapon.description: You can use the traps and other security devices installed all throughout the mansion to attack.

weapon.name: Tank
weapon.description: You use your favorite tank to blast or run over your enemies.

weapon.name: Combat Helicopter
weapon.description: You use your favorite combat helicopter to shoot or bombard your enemies.

weapon.name: Torture Implements
weapon.description: Torture implements that are awful just to look at. Fingernail pullers, the iron maiden, finger crushers, etc.

weapon.name: Handgun
weapon.description: A revolver, derringer, automatic pistol, or other handgun.

weapon.name: Machinegun
weapon.description: A machinegun that can throw out a rain of bullets in a short period of time.

weapon.name: Rifle
weapon.description: An assault rifle, shotgun, musket, etc.

weapon.name: Bomb/Grenade
weapon.description: You use bombs, grenades, or maybe plastic explosives.

weapon.name: Bazooka
weapon.description: When a fight breaks out you pull out a big-ass bazooka.

weapon.name: Ray Gun
weapon.description: It might look like a prop of a 50s sci-fi B movie, but the ray gun you’re packing really does hurt people.

weapon.name: Devil Power
weapon.description: Your physical body, fused with a demon, is a weapon in itself. You use this overwhelming, superhuman power to crush your foes. How it works exactly is up to you.

weapon.name: Hammer
weapon.description: You wield a hammer, whether a small throwing hammer or a big warhammer. Or possibly a squeaky toy hammer.

weapon.name: Scythe
weapon.description: You wield a big scythe worthy of the Grim Reaper.

weapon.name: Kung Fu Weapon
weapon.description: Nunchucks, Three-Section Staff, Tonfa, Sai, Tai Chi Sword, etc.

weapon.name: Chainsaw
weapon.description: Never mind how loud it is; you fight with a chainsaw!

weapon.name: Wooden
weapon.description: You wield a bokken - Japanese-style wooden sword - or a staff.

weapon.name: Axe/Hatchet
weapon.description: A tomahawk, battle axe, halberd, etc.

weapon.name: Morningstar
weapon.description: Basically a mace with spikes. You can have a flail instead if you like.

weapon.name: Western Sword
weapon.description: A long sword, rapier, flamberge, two-handed sword, etc., etc.

weapon.name: Whip
weapon.description: A normal whip, a cat of nine tails, a metal whip, etc.

weapon.name: Spear
weapon.description: A spear, lance, javelin, etc.

weapon.name: Exotic
weapon.description: A boomerang, qatar, African throwing irons, etc.

weapon.name: Knife/Scalpel
weapon.description: You attack with a knife or scalpel. You can throw it too, and it can be a large dagger if you like.

weapon.name: Chain/Rope
weapon.description: You attack with a chain or rope.

weapon.name: Claws
weapon.description: You attack with claws, a bagh nakh, cestus, or some other claw-like weapon.

weapon.name: Katana
weapon.description: You wield a katana, or possibly a kusarigama or some other traditional Japanese weapon.

weapon.name: Beam Attack
weapon.description: You can fire a destructive beam of light, heat, cold, or electricity from your hands or eyes. This is not a power possessed by human beings.

weapon.name: Fire
weapon.description: You can spew fire from your hands or mouth. This makes it kind of hard to believe that you’re human.

weapon.name: Summoning
weapon.description: You are able to summon some kind of special being to attack. You can decide what you summon and how it attacks.

weapon.name: Magic
weapon.description: You use magic to attack. Or at least something that we might as well call magic.

weapon.name: Psychic Powers
weapon.description: Well, you have some kind of psychic/super power that you use to attack. You can decide the details.

weapon.name: Book
weapon.description: You wield a book as a blunt instrument, and possibly tear out pages, to attack.

weapon.name: Internal
weapon.description: You have some kind of weapons installed in your body.

weapon.name: Religious Symbol
weapon.description: You can use a cross, prayer wheel, paper charm, or other seemingly harmless religious symbol to deliver attacks.
